definition: the first modern Chinese library established in 1898 by William A.P. Martin 丁韙良|丁韪良, becoming the foundation for Peking University library
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: It is generally believed that teaching of the English language in China began with Tong Wen Guan (The Imperial College of Translators).
sentences.chinese: 人們一般認爲中國學校英語教學肇始於京師同文館。
